name: move

schema.title: Nx Angular Move
schema.description: Move an Angular project to another folder in the workspace.

projectName.description: The name of the Angular project to move.

destination.description: The folder to move the Angular project into.

importPath.description: The new import path to use in the `tsconfig.base.json`.

updateImportPath.description: Update the import path to reflect the new location.

description: Moves an Angular application or library to another folder within the workspace and updates the project configuration.
